rev.comment: I doubt those articles will be created, or even: should they even be created?

Several Live Cds are dedicated to specific type of applications according to the requirements of thematic user communities. These Cds are tailored to the needs of the applications in subject including general knowledge, tutorial, specifications and trial data too. Most important topics are the following:
